config.annotation_max_length: Max count of characters shown in the inline annotations. Exceeding parts will displayed as ellipses (...)
config.dir_structure: Preferred directory structure to organize locale files
config.enabled_frameworks: Specify the frameworks support to enable. If no value is set, the extension will detect frameworks automatically.
config.enabled_parsers: Specify the parsers of local file formats. It will enables all the possible parser by default.
config.encoding: Locale files encoding, default to "auto" (auto detect)
config.full_reload_on_changed: Perform a full reload on locale file changed. (for .js/.ts dynamic import)
config.indent: Indent space size for locale files
config.keep_fulfill: Always keep all keys fulfilled with empty string
config.locales_paths: Path to locales directory (relative to project root), glob pattern is also acceptable.
config.match_regex: Regex string to match locale filename. (The first group should be the locale code)
config.preferred_delimiter: Preferred delimiter of composed keypath, default to "-"(dash)
config.prompt_translating_source: Prompt to select source locale on translating every time. If set false, the source language in the config will be used.
prompt.config_locales_info: Config the locales directory for your project
prompt.delete_keys_not_in_use: Are you sure to delete {0} keys that are not in use?
prompt.enter_file_path_to_store_key: Enter the file path to store key "{0}"
prompt.enter_i18n_key: Enter the i18n key path (for example: home.document.title)
prompt.error_on_parse_custom_regex: Failed to parse RegExp string {0}. Please check your config
prompt.frameworks_not_found:
The following framework(s) are not found, please check your settings.
{0}
prompt.fullfill_missing_all_confirm:
Are you sure to fulfill all missing keys with empty string cross all locales?

This operation cannot be undone.
prompt.fullfill_missing_confirm:
Are you sure to fulfill {0} missing keys with empty string in {1}?

This operation cannot be undone.
prompt.key_already_exists: Key already exists. Do you want to override the existing value or re-enter the path?
prompt.keystyle_select: Which kind of key style do you use to organize your locales?
prompt.locales_dir_not_found: Locales directory not found. i18n Ally is disabled.
prompt.new_key_path: Enter the keypath of the new key
prompt.new_key_value: Enter the transalation for "{1}" of the new keypath "{0}"
prompt.support: i18n Ally is offered to everyone for free, if you find it useful, please consider supporting it. Thank you! ‚ù§
prompt.translate_missing_confirm:
Are you sure to translate {0} missing keys for language "{1}" from "{2}"?

This operation cannot be undone.
prompt.writing_js: Writing to js/ts file is not supported.
view.usage_report_none: Press refresh to start analyst key usages.
